Featured-image:

Description: This V-neck with sheer material across the bust is elegant and sexy. Ruching is used to slim the waist and accent the bust. The applique with rhinestones adds a style design and shimmer to this beautiful gown. The slight train and capped sleeves finish this dress that is ready for a bridesmaid or another special occasion.
